actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide for a study on the accessibility of substance use disorder treatment and mental health care providers and services for farmers and ranchers, and for other purposes.
short_title: Agricultural Access to Substance Use Disorder Treatment and Mental Health Care Act of 2025

titles.title: Agricultural Access to Substance Use Disorder Treatment and Mental Health Care Act of 2025
Agricultural Access to Substance Use Disorder Treatment and Mental Health Care Act of 2025
A bill to provide for a study on the accessibility of substance use disorder treatment and mental health care providers and services for farmers and ranchers, and for other purposes.
